pullrequest.title: Update of installation procedures and contact information

content.raw:
Both NinJS and restview do the same change in formatting to the address. It's strictly because of the use of "Address" as a first field. If you change "Address" to anything else, the formatting is the same as the rest of the table. The reason being is these renderers add 
 tags around the address text. As far as I can tell in the actual python documentation, these tags are not added and therefore shouldn't change the formatting.

I've placed the address on a single line in the new commit. It will still however show up monospaced in ninjs because of the reasons stated above.
content.html:
Both NinJS and restview do the same change in formatting to the address. It's strictly because of the use of "Address" as a first field. If you change "Address" to anything else, the formatting is the same as the rest of the table.

The reason being is these renderers add <pre class="address"></pre> tags around the address text. As far as I can tell in the actual python documentation, these tags are not added and therefore shouldn't change the formatting.

I've placed the address on a single line in the new commit. It will still however show up monospaced in ninjs because of the reasons stated above.
